description: a(n+1) is next smallest prime beginning with a(n), initial prime is 2.
links: Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..500
mathematica: b = 10; s = {{2}};Do[NestWhile[# + 1 &, 0, ! (PrimeQ[FromDigits[tmp = Join[Last[s], (nn = #;IntegerDigits[nn - Sum[b^n, {n, l = NestWhile[# + 1 &, 1, ! (nn - (Sum[b^n, {n, #}]) < 0) &] - 1}], b, l + 1])], b]]) &]; AppendTo[s, tmp], {20}]; Map[FromDigits, s] (* _Peter J. C. Moses_, Aug 06 2015 *)
crossrefs: Similar to but different from A069603.
author: _Patrick De Geest_, May 15 1999
